mapper.sql: ID, SYS_ITEM_ID, LEVEL, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, TYPE, WEIGHT, MUSIC, IS_DELETED, MULTI_TYPE
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_ONLINE_AWARD where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or SYS_ITEM_ID like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ONLINE_AWARD (ID, SYS_ITEM_ID, LEVEL, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, TYPE, WEIGHT, MUSIC, IS_DELETED, MULTI_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{music,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

replace into SYS_ONLINE_AWARD (ID, SYS_ITEM_ID, LEVEL, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, TYPE, WEIGHT, MUSIC, IS_DELETED, MULTI_TYPE) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.music,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into SYS_ONLINE_AWARD
ID,
SYS_ITEM_ID,
LEVEL,
UNIT,
UNIT_TYPE,
TYPE,
WEIGHT,
MUSIC,
IS_DELETED,
MULTI_TYPE,

mapper.update:
update SYS_ONLINE_AWARD
SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MUSIC = #{music,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MULTI_TYPE = #{multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_ONLINE_AWARD set SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MUSIC = #{music,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MULTI_TYPE = #{multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
